Journal Story: Today I joined trailjournal.com. Its getting closer to my start date. Excited
Working more in getting my gear together. The real main concern is weight! I'm trying to staying between 30 to 35 pounds.
Loading up food boxes for Amanda to mail to different Post Offices, Motels and Hostels along the way, called Mail Drops for resupply.

Getting closer to my date of 03/15/17. Have most of my drop boxes packed and ready to be shipped out. I am now counting down the days. The excitement is so real. The last time I had this was in the Army.
